# Sample Transactions

## Transaction Fee

Transaction fee is payed by consuming XRD tokens and making a system call.

In example [`transaction_fee.txt`](./transaction_fee.txt),
- A `HEADER` instruction is employed to disallow resource minting and burning
- A transaction fee is payed via `SYSCALL`
- The remaining instructions are a staking action

## Tokens

### Create a new token

Example: [`token_create.txt`](./token_create.txt)

- Token resource address: `0x032121e6dcb2eb4edc634a93b02e0c4a3a328d80c0673c14eb79cb`
- Token minter address: `0x0402a24645512934a03a9266ea31cf7b3a29a9311faa65c8ed0d68ac24e1cfa3393f`
- Token symbol: `"doge"`
- Token name: `"Dogecoin"`
- Token description: `"Dogecoin is an open source peer-to-peer digital currency, favored by Shiba Inus worldwide."`
- Token icon url: `"https://dogecoin.com/icon.png"`
- Token url: `"https://dogecoin.com/"`
- Token supply: `10`

### Transfer tokens

Example: [`token_transfer.txt`](./token_transfer.txt)

- Token resource address: `0x03c81161158edfd37cfee329ff957c1e31c9f45841549a3e3f8829`
- From address: `0x0403cc5a7e43d9e1174171a55b6c0ba8c1ad1693abd0c734d8782e8525e09b6c757a`
- To address: `0x04021889ddebe74830d9a4714ef07f57d146ef925b9b436f223486bfcc6e9ea00a09`
- Transfer amount: `6`

### Burn tokens

Example: [`token_burn.txt`](./token_burn.txt)

- Token resource address: `0x03212c15d72a3a14014811bc3381d3f495770a66433f411288196e`
- Token owner address: `0x0403a57531da3dea3848ddcbbd44620939d73d36a298b9349fa3742a5dc0c318a76e`
- Burn amount: `10`

### Stake XRD

1. [`xrd_stake1.txt`](./xrd_stake1.txt) - Full stake
1. [`xrd_stake2.txt`](./xrd_stake2.txt) - Partial stake

### Unstake XRD

1. [`xrd_unstake1.txt`](./xrd_unstake1.txt) - Full unstake
1. [`xrd_unstake2.txt`](./xrd_unstake2.txt) - Partial unstake

## Validator

### Register a new validator

Example: [`validator_register.txt`](./validator_register.txt)

- Validator public key: `0x026a321d9fc529259eeaeced552fead089e82841f95dfd953a648a84ebabc34aad`
- Validator name: `"radix"`
- Validator url: `"https://www.radix.com"`

### Unregister a validator

Example: [`validator_unregister.txt`](./validator_unregister.txt)

- Validator public key: `0x021a115022d969f62f1f4807f9a7ff54b1b2a18b2066c27fa5c5de9c39f17cb62b`
- Validator name: `"radix"`
- Validator url: `"https://www.radix.com"`

## Additional Examples

### Fee + Stake + Transfer
- Txn ID: `26c64c74a56863696e637f1efea710d39507cdf5a795a7dd645154a8c71d439f`
- Txn Payload: ``

### Fee + Transfer + Stake
- Txn ID: `dd315ccecfe991fbfd6118a122c1b6c99d67094cba21028b94c81599049e7c9e`
- Txn Payload: ``

### Fee + Unstake + Transfer
- Txn ID: `58c89726be35fb33c8dee86eb6c1cfbc3107b07e3818d115201914735f02a85d`
- Txn Payload: ``

### Fee + Transfer + Unstake
- Txn ID: `d8a0aa158f7fd03b261709dc7d64561de653de8b1d9489567c43370728d73f12`
- Txn Payload: ``

### Fee + Transfer + Transfer
- Txn ID: `4744eaf2842d9d451c4293f1ee3964f638a14bca37fbdb900b4f5381c81af1d4`
- Txn Payload: ``
